mapper.sql: id, class_code, ctr_code, course_code, status, firstclass_time, endclass_time, day_of_week, ei, ta, ii, remarks, create_time, update_time, last_update_user
mapper.insert: insert into plc_class (id, class_code, ctr_code, course_code, status, firstclass_time, endclass_time, day_of_week, ei, ta, ii, remarks, create_time, update_time, last_update_user) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{classCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctrCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{courseCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{firstclassTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endclassTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dayOfWeek,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ei,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ta,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ii,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), now(), #{lastUpdateUser,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update plc_class
class_code = #{classCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ctr_code = #{ctrCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
course_code = #{courseCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
firstclass_time = #{firstclassTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
endclass_time = #{endclassTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
day_of_week = #{dayOfWeek,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ei = #{ei,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ta = #{ta,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ii = #{ii,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = now(),
last_update_user = #{lastUpdateUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update plc_class set class_code = #{classCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ctr_code = #{ctrCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, course_code = #{courseCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, firstclass_time = #{firstclassTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, endclass_time = #{endclassTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, day_of_week = #{dayOfWeek,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ei = #{ei,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ta = #{ta,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ii = #{ii,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = now(), last_update_user = #{lastUpdateUser,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT
from plc_class
AND ctr_code= #{ctrCode}
AND status = 1
select count(1) from plc_class where class_code = #{classCode}
